# Set up microservice
RUN wget -O nfvo-driver-vim-1.0.0-RC0.zip https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1020/org/openo/nfvo/vimadapter-deployment/1.0.0-RC0/vimadapter-deployment-1.0.0-RC0.zip
RUN unzip -o -B nfvo-driver-vim-1.0.0-RC0.zip
